alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Highlands, southeastern Hardee, eastern Charlotte, DeSoto and northeastern Lee Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 310 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Venus to 9 miles north of Muse to 7 miles north of Olga. Movement was northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arcadia, Lake Placid, Southeast Arcadia, Sylvan Shores, Lake Istokpoga, Babcock Ranch, Charleston Park, Babcock Webb Wma, Venus, Olga, Nocatee, Brownville, Alva, Harbour Heights, Cleveland, Lake Josephine, Archbold, Placid Lakes, Lake Suzy and Fort Ogden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
